name: San Francisco Diaper Bank
description: Free diapers for CalFresh, Medi-Cal, and CalWORKs households with children under age two (up to two cases per child/month)
fullDescription: The San Francisco Diaper Bank provides free diapers to low-income families enrolled in public assistance programs, helping reduce the financial burden of essential baby supplies.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free diapers for eligible families
- For children under age two
- Up to two cases per child/month
- Available to CalFresh recipients
- Available to Medi-Cal recipients
- Available to CalWORKs households
howToGetIt:
1. Must be enrolled in CalFresh, Medi-Cal, or CalWORKs
2. Child must be under age two
3. Enroll through SFHSA website
4. Provide proof of benefit enrollment
5. Select diaper size and pickup location
6. Pick up monthly allotment
keywords: SF Diaper Bank, free diapers, under age two, CalFresh, Medi-Cal, CalWORKs, baby supplies, two cases
